Verses: 1 pinbu Yosuvaa Isravelin Koththirangalaiyellaam Seekemile Koodivarappanni, Isravelin Moopparaiyum, Thalaivaraiyum, Nyaayaadhipadhigalaiyum, Adhipadhigalaiyum Varavazhaiththaan; Avargal Dhevanudaiya Sannidhiyil Vandhu Nindraargal.
2 yosuvaa Isravelin Moopparaiyum, Thalaivaraiyum, Nyaayaadhipadhigalaiyum, Adhipadhigalaiyum, Matra Ellaaraiyum Azhaippiththu, Avargalai Nokki: Naan Vayadhusendru Mudhirndhavanaanen.
3 ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ungalukku Munbaaga Indha Sagala Jaadhigalukkum Seydha Yaavaiyum Neengal Kandeergal; Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Thaame Ungalukkaaga Yuththampanninaar.

4 paarungal, Yordhaan Mudhal Naan Nirmoolamaakkinavaigalum, Merkilulla Periya Samuththiramattum Innum Meedhiyaayirukkiravaigalumaana Sagala Jaadhigalin Dhesaththaiyum Seettuppottu; Ungalukku, Ungal Koththirangalukkuth Thakkadhaai, Sudhandharamaagap Pangitten.
5 naan Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Anuppi, Egipthiyarai Vaadhiththen, Appadi Avargal Naduvile Naan Seydhapinbu Ungalaip Purappadappanninen.

6 naan Ungal Pidhaakkalai Egipthilirundhu Purappadappanninapodhu Samuththirakkaraikku Vandheergal; Egipthiyar Radhangalodum Kudhiraiveerarodum Ungal Pidhaakkalai Sivandha Samuththiramattum Pinthodarndhaargal.

7 avargal Karththarai Nokkik Kooppittaargal; Appozhudhu Avar Ungalukkum Egipthiyarukkum Naduve Andhagaaraththai Varappanni, Samuththiraththai Avargalmel Puralachcheydhu, Avargalai Moodippottaar; Naan Egipthile Seydhadhai Ungal Kangal Kandadhu; Pinbu Vanaandharaththil Aneganaal Sanjariththeergal.

8 adharkuppinbu Ungalai Yordhaanukku Appuraththile Kudiyirundha Emoriyarin Dhesaththirkuk Konduvandhen; Avargal Ungalodu Yuththampannugirapodhu, Avargalai Ungal Kaiyil Oppukkoduththen; Avargal Dhesaththaik Kattikkondeergal; Avargalai Ungal Mugaththinindru Azhiththuvitten.
9 appozhudhu Sipporin Kumaaran Paalaak Ennum Movaabiyarin Raajaa Ezhumbi, Isravelodu Yuththampanni, Ungalai Sabikkumpadi, Peyorin Kumaaranaagiya Pileyaamai Azhaiththanuppinaan.
10 pileyaamukku Sevikodukka Enakku Siththamillaadhadhinaale, Avan Ungalai Aaseervadhikkave Aaseervadhiththaan, Ivvidhamaai Ungalai Avan Kaikkuth Thappuviththen.

11 pinbu Yordhaanaik Kadandhu Erigovukku Vandheergal; Erigovin Kudigalum, Emoriyarum, Perisiyarum, Kaanaaniyarum, Eththiyarum, Kirkaasiyarum, Eviyarum, Eboosiyarum, Ungalukku Virodhamaaga Yuththampanninaargal; Aanaalum Avargalai Naan Ungal Kaiyile Oppukkoduththen.

12 emoriyarin Irandu Raajaakkalaiyum Ungal Pattayaththaalum Ungal Villaalum Neengal Thuraththavillai; Naan Ungalukku Munbaagak Kulavigalai Anuppinen; Avaigal Avargalai Ungal Munnindru Thuraththivittadhu.

13 appadiye Neengal Panpaduththaadha Dhesaththaiyum, Neengal Kattaadha Pattanangalaiyum Ungalukkuk Koduththen, Avaigalil Kudiyirukkireergal; Neengal Nadaadha Dhraatchaiththottangalin Palanaiyum Olivaththoppugalin Palanaiyum Pusikkireergal Endraar.
14 aagaiyaal Neengal Karththarukku Bayandhu, Avarai Uththamamum Unmaiyumaai Seviththu, Ungal Pidhaakkal Nadhikku Appuraththilum Egipthilum Seviththa Dhevargalai Agatrivittu, Karththarai Seviyungal.

15 karththarai Sevikkiradhu Ungal Paarvaikku Aagaadhadhaaik Kandaal, Pinnai Yaarai Sevippeergal Endru Indru Therindhu Kollungal; Nadhikku Appuraththil Ungal Pidhaakkal Seviththa Dhevargalai Sevippeergalo? Neengal Vaasampannugira Dhesaththuk Kudigalaagiya Emoriyarin Dhevargalai Sevippeergalo? Naanum En Veettaarumovendraal,karththaraiye Sevippom Endraan.
16 appozhudhu Janangal Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Vere Dhevargalai Sevikkumpadi, Karththaraivittu Vilakugira Kaariyam Engalukku Dhooramaayiruppadhaaga.

17 nammaiyum Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalaiyum Adimaiththana Veedaagiya Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappadappanni, Nammudaiya Kangalukku Munbaagap Periya Adaiyaalangalai Seydhu, Naam Nadandha Ellaa Vazhiyilum, Naam Kadandhu Vandha Ellaa Janangalukkullum Nammaik Kaappaatrinavar Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththardhaame.
18 dhesaththile Kudiyirundha Emoriyar Mudhalaana Sagala Janangalaiyum Karththar Namakku Munbaagath Thuraththinaare; Aagaiyaal Naangalum Karththarai Sevippom, Avare Nammudaiya Dhevan Endraargal.
19 yosuvaa Janangalai Nokki: Neengal Karththarai Sevikkamaatteergal; Avar Parisuththamulla Dhevan, Avar Erichchalulla Dhevan; Ungal Meerudhalaiyum Ungal Paavangalaiyum Manniyaar.
20 karththar Ungalukku Nanmai Seydhirukka, Neengal Karththarai Vittu, Anniya Dhevargalai Seviththaal, Avar Thirumbi Ungalukkuth Theemai Seydhu, Ungalai Nirmoolamaakkuvaar Endraan.
21 janangal Yosuvaavai Nokki: Appadiyalla, Naangal Karththaraiye Sevippom Endraargal.
22 appozhudhu Yosuvaa Janangalai Nokki: Karththarai Sevikkumpadi Neengal Avaraith Therindhukondadharku Neengale Ungalukku Saatchigal Endraan. Adharku Avargal: Naangale Saatchigal Endraargal.
23 appozhudhu Avan: Appadiyaanaal, Ippozhudhum Ungal Naduve Irukkira Anniya Dhevargalai Agatrivittu, Ungal Irudhayaththai Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkuneraagath Thiruppungal Endraan.
24 appozhudhu Janangal Yosuvaavai Nokki: Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththaraiyeseviththu, Avar Saththaththirke Keezhppadivom Endraargal.
25 andhappadi Yosuvaa Annaalil Seekemile Janangalode Udanpadikkaipanni, Avargalukku Adhaip Pramaanamum Nyaayamumaaga Erpaduththinaan.

26 indha Vaarththaigalai Yosuvaa Dhevanudaiya Nyaayappramaana Pusthagaththil Ezhudhi, Oru Periya Kallai Eduththu, Adhai Ange Karththarudaiya Parisuththa Sthalaththin Arugil Irundha Karvaali Maraththinkeezh Naatti,

27 ellaa Janangalaiyum Nokki: Idho, Indhak Kal Namakkulle Saatchiyaayirukkakkadavadhu;karththar Nammode Sonna Ellaa Vaarththaigalaiyum Idhu Kettadhu; Neengal Ungal Dhevanukku Virodhamaagap Poisollaadhapadikku, Idhu Ungalukku Saatchiyaayirukkakkadavadhu Endru Solli,
28 yosuvaa Janangalai Avaravar Sudhandharaththirku Anuppivittaan.
29 indhak Kaariyangal Nadandhapinbu, Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaa Ennum Karththarudaiyaoozhiyakkaaran Nootrup Paththu Vayadhullavanaai Maranamadaindhaan.
30 avanai Eppiraayeemin Malaiththesaththilulla Kaayaas Malaikku Vadakke Irukkira Thimnaadh Seraa Ennum Avanudaiya Sudhandharaththin Ellaikkulle Adakkampanninaargal.

31 yosuvaa Uyirodirundha Sagala Naatkalilum, Karththar Isravelukku Seydha Avarudaiya Kiriyaigal Yaavaiyum Arindhu Yosuvaavukkuppinbu Vegunaal Uyirodirundha Moopparudaiya Sagala Naatkalilum, Isravelar Karththarai Seviththaargal.

32 isravel Puththirar Egipthileyirundhu Konduvandha Yoseppin Elumbugalai, Avargal Seekemile Yaakkobu Seekemin Thagappanaagiya Emoriyarudaiya Puththirarin Kaiyil Nooru Vellikkaasukkuk Konda Nilaththin Pangile Adakkampanninaargal; Andha Nilam Yoseppin Puththirarukku Sudhandharamaayitru.
33 aaronin Kumaaranaagiya Eleyaasaarum Maranamadaindhaan, Avan Kumaaranaagiya Pinekaasukku Eppiraayeemin Malaiththesaththile Kodukkappatta Mettile Avanai Adakkampanninaargal.
